content: I was checking the profiling section and in particular, I think this part should be updated https://rustc-dev-guide.rust-lang.org/profiling/with_perf.html#analyzing-a-perf-profile-with-perf-focus
I remember talking with @Nicholas Nethercote about the possibility of writing something for rustc-guide
unsure if @Nicholas Nethercote have time for that, or can help us laying out ideas and a layout for this that we can fill in some way
but I guess we need a better profiling section too :)
